quote: When I ask clients why they called me, it reinforces their decision to choose me.
why_clipworthy: It highlights a simple yet effective tactic to reinforce client decisions.
suggested_hook: Want to know a simple question that can seal the deal with clients?

quote: I send personalized video messages for birthdays, and clients love it.
why_clipworthy: Shows a personal touch that strengthens client relationships.
suggested_hook: Here's a unique way to make your clients feel special on their big day.
